content.title: Watch: Turkey's Unmanned Jet Makes History With Radar-Guided Air-To-Air Kill
content.body: Just in: Kizilelma destroyed a jet-powered aerial target identified by Aselsan's Murad Aesa radar with a Beyond Visual Range air-to-air Gokdogan missile.
